channel.title: Linux on IronShark
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on IronShark

item.title: Digital Art with NixOS
item.description: TLDR This article describes how I have configured my Linux workstation using NixOS to learn the basics of digital art. Including installing Krita, and managing it's config files. Configuring a user input devices, and managing completed projects with git.

item.title: A Linux Journey Retrospective
item.description: As a part of writing the "https://ironshark.org/technology/2022/09/04/linux-journey.html" article, and my larger project of switching to https://nixos.org/ for daily use. I decided to go through all of the https://linuxjourney.com/ lessons again.
